Model.Rd

Model object, ready for sampling

Model object, ready for sampling

See also

rstan::sampling()

Public fields

form

Form of the neuromodulation (additive or multiplicative)

Methods

Public methods

  • Model$new()

Method new()

Create a new Model object.

Usage

Model$new(form)

Arguments

form

Form of neuromodulation in the model.

Returns

A new Model object.

Method sample()

Draw samples from the posterior of the model

Usage

Model$sample(d = NULL, standata = NULL, prior = Prior$new(), ...)

Arguments

d

dataframe from which to make standata

standata

data to pass directly to stan. Can be produced with make_standata(). If present, this data will be used rather than the data stored in d.

prior

An object of class Prior

...

further arguments passed to rstan::sampling().

Returns

A new ModelFit. Prepare data for running model

Method make_standata()

Usage

Model$make_standata(d, prior = Prior$new())

Arguments

d

dataframe from which to make standata. The output of this can be passed to vtf().

prior

A Prior

Returns

named list

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

Model$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
